name: Wavelength
description:
Stand by for Wavelength

Fly through an on-rails synthwave environment, destroying and dodging enemies along the way.

==============================

CONTROLS

Keyboard/Mouse:

Movement: Arrow keys or WASD

Fire: Space

Switch Weapons: N

Mute Music: M

Pause: P

Controller Mappings (for platform/browser/controller combinations that support it):

Movement: Left Stick or Right Stick

Fire: Right Trigger or Left Trigger or 'A' Button on Xbox Controller

Switch Weapons: Right Shoulder Button or Left Shoulder Button

Mute Music: D-pad Down

Pause: Start or Select
